/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a vibrant tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are rich and varied, from the warm hues of the buildings to the cool tones of the sky.
